mapper.select: select cm.id as id, cm.proprietor_house_id as proprietorHouseId, cm.proprietor_id as proprietorId, cm.house_num as houseNum, cm.type as type, cm.url as url, cm.name as name, cm.size as size, cm.create_time as createTime, cm.staff_id as staffId, ps.name as staffName, cm.oem_code as oemCode from property.t_checkin_material cm left join property.t_property_staff ps on ps.id = cm.staff_id where cm.proprietor_house_id = #{proprietorHouseId}
